# **Lab2** # {-}

# __Packages Installation__ ##

## **Vegan & ggplot2 Packages** ##

  Installation of the relevant packages
    ex. *vegan* and *ggplot2* are installed
```{r, results=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
if(!require("vegan")){
  install.packages("vegan")
  library("vegan")
  
}
if(!require("ggplot2")){
  install.packages("ggplot2")
  library("ggplot2")
}
```

## **Dune Transformation** ##
Log transformation on the dune dataset
```{r, results=FALSE}
#Load dune data from vegan package
data(dune)
#Reassign to a new variable
dune2 <- dune

#log1p transformation
log1p(dune2)
```
